member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.SiteSync.SiteSyncResources.WhenDoYouNeedSynchronization
member.summary: phrase: When do you need synchronization...
member.value:
When do you need synchronization?
You need synchronization if you want to have several stages (servers/sites) for your data
e.g. 1 Work; 2 Test; 3 Production (live)
Or you can use it to simply transfer your structure and data to another server. For example, you can migrate all data from your site to existing Multisite instance.
